l/ytoken-mvp/contracts/interfaces/IPot.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9a793ca8c0435f889045be1ad6a6102213d82faad65b214afee4f69eeef5e0aa","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://e91732a55858a7779d9791a16e7c99aec2e871ecfbf334fbd9db25d917b9a06f","dweb:/ipfs/QmT5gnCRchuL8mwrRGqgvQTGm4EzPmEcdW2w9vdfZwYxj3"]},"/Users/bruce/dev/yieldprotocol/ytoken-mvp/contracts/interfaces/ITreasury.sol":{"keccak256":"0x22f3a6f0748fb08d401715370df53e73964c4a9a4abc6dea9b13027ac38b211d","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://81a26690ace507131a672128b24181c6c8c5c9e3d865a2dbc29f46630fc3449e","dweb:/ipfs/QmeoRDayHr4kXAPfGNjLJjfdbey5enn2EZbNb1THwHHCdY"]},"/Users/bruce/dev/yieldprotocol/ytoken-mvp/contracts/interfaces/IVat.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0526607eb1c5cc4f6f89d3b57875156116cf6ad6944bb33f95384ee97d36e42b","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://d7df02dd0eaae52d38f140541756498a98f04f20180cf798e5f1a2835fa6000e","dweb:/ipfs/QmPH87GKNEVSHZvw8ZfkWuMgTMn8oJj9Ywdy69yVruuXyR"]},"/Users/bruce/dev/yieldprotocol/ytoken-mvp/contracts/interfaces/IYDai.sol":{"keccak256":"0x486d46db89327ab4b184e244001b070caa4439afad21587ae8c82f8bb8cc7904","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://f1fad83930091ddd75535efdd50b3a990184be3ae186e86a2fc5657dd689c24d","dweb:/ipfs/QmTNmntJpejgLxkWQdFvEZFVJN51E5S5ibRrE4KLngsFwA"]},"@nomiclabs/buidler/console.sol":{"keccak256":"0x44cc7ee73e8dec62faea33a601a013775ccf76312e72e9cbf14ea95d13731543","urls":["bzz-raw://baa2091b9fe20b893e030cc2a4d1540466381c2ee2bc019d410669c9012e4bc3","dweb:/ipfs/QmcMcCkQWsdmvDmych9a393ji2XNTmHuXLP1d76Mmvsqhk"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/GSN/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0de74dfa6b37943c1b834cbd8fb7a8d052e5ff80c7adb33692102dd6cd2985e9","urls":["bzz-raw://9d2d827fcf4a838f5821732c0acd6a40d21c2a5a2cfe2563feec91465f47bb60","dweb:/ipfs/Qmex3wMKf5Sghbfvr288RUg1kP2uAyTMf11w83WbMbpQQc"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9a8c691b81a4a48adbbd5b010faa56a168c189e711495c16347d93b60b805f82","urls":["bzz-raw://d951d626ed7bfe1a2d7a6bd4af315ff8691929bd567594d6ab53599fe9e17e4e","dweb:/ipfs/QmYkGeowpa6Bjr9aaDirWdDo7hSfShzzZhanKC4nTfRhLj"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/math/Math.sol":{"keccak256":"0x50280546205978ca6573541955e15453b4c07a19e6c8ec4f6785a5ae0d7343fb","urls":["bzz-raw://6463c7833ba4b3cbc3b56d50b56e7ce870aaec674633d7897a459b234478fa3e","dweb:/ipfs/QmRkfjwTpA5E4SxUoHw8Qb7g6eXahtgmLrWWtTGH2TDZLj"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/math/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x04d34b3cd5677bea25f8dfceb6dec0eaa071d4d4b789a43f13fe0c415ba4c296","urls":["bzz-raw://e7e8b526a6839e5ba14f0d23a830387fec47f7043ce01d42c9f285b709a9d080","dweb:/ipfs/QmXmhhFmX5gcAvVzNiDPAGA35iHMPNaYtQkACswRHBVTNw"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6cc1cb934a3ac2137a7dcaed018af9e235392236ceecfd3687259702b9c767ad","urls":["bzz-raw://0055fa88138cd1c3c6440370f8580f85857f8fe9dec41c99af9eafbeb8d9c3ce","dweb:/ipfs/QmX1xDh8vwGLLCH8ti45eXjQ7Wcxv1FEGTR3jkFnd5Nv6F"]}},"version":1}

documentation.text:
@dev The Controller manages collateral and debt levels for all users, and it is a major user entry point for the Yield protocol.
 Controller keeps track of a number of yDai contracts.
 Controller allows users to post and withdraw Chai and Weth collateral.
 Any transactions resulting in a user weth collateral below dust are reverted.
 Controller allows users to borrow yDai against their Chai and Weth collateral.
 Controller allows users to repay their yDai debt with yDai or with Dai.
 Controller integrates with yDai contracts for minting yDai on borrowing, and burning yDai on repaying debt with yDai.
 Controller relies on Treasury for all other asset transfers.
 Controller allows orchestrated contracts to erase any amount of debt or collateral for an user. This is to be used during liquidations or during unwind.
 Users can delegate the control of their accounts in Controllers to any address.
@dev Only valid collateral types are Weth and Chai.
@dev Only series added through `addSeries` are valid.
@dev Return the total number of series registered
@dev Returns if a series has been added to the Controller, for a given series identified by maturity
@dev Adds an yDai series to this Controller
@dev Disables post, withdraw, borrow and repay. To be called only when Treasury shuts down.
@dev Returns the dai equivalent of an yDai amount, for a given series identified by maturity
@dev Returns the yDai equivalent of a dai amount, for a given series identified by maturity
@dev Return debt in dai of an user, for a given collateral and series identified by maturity
@dev Returns the total debt of an user, for a given collateral, across all series, in Dai
@dev Maximum borrowing power of an user in dai for a given collateral
@dev Return if the borrowing power for a given collateral of an user is equal or greater than its debt for the same collateral
@dev Return if the collateral of an user is between zero and the dust level
@dev Takes collateral _token from `from` address, and credits it to `to` collateral account.
@dev Returns collateral to `to` address, taking it from `from` collateral account.
@dev Mint yDai for a given series for address `to` by locking its market value in collateral, user debt is increased in the given collateral.
@dev Burns yDai of a given series from `from` address, user debt is decreased for the given collateral and yDai series.
@dev Takes dai from `from` address, user debt is decreased for the given collateral and yDai series.
@dev Removes an amount of debt from an user's vault. If interest was accrued debt is only paid proportionally.
@dev Removes all collateral and debt for an user, for a given collateral type.

 Controller integrates with yDai contracts for minting yDai on borrowing, and burning yDai on repaying debt with yDai.
 Controller relies on Treasury for all other asset transfers.
 Controller allows orchestrated contracts to erase any amount of debt or collateral for an user. This is to be used during liquidations or during unwind.
 Users can delegate the control of their accounts in Controllers to any address.

devdoc.details: The Controller manages collateral and debt levels for all users, and it is a major user entry point for the Yield protocol. Controller keeps track of a number of yDai contracts. Controller allows users to post and withdraw Chai and Weth collateral. Any transactions resulting in a user weth collateral below dust are reverted. Controller allows users to borrow yDai against their Chai and Weth collateral. Controller allows users to repay their yDai debt with yDai or with Dai. Controller integrates with yDai contracts for minting yDai on borrowing, and burning yDai on repaying debt with yDai. Controller relies on Treasury for all other asset transfers. Controller allows orchestrated contracts to erase any amount of debt or collateral for an user. This is to be used during liquidations or during unwind. Users can delegate the control of their accounts in Controllers to any address.

aboveDustOrZero(bytes32,address).details: Return if the collateral of an user is between zero and the dust level

addDelegate(address).details: Enable a delegate to act on the behalf of caller

addSeries(address).details: Adds an yDai series to this Controller

borrow(bytes32,uint256,address,address,u.details: Mint yDai for a given series for address `to` by locking its market value in collateral, user debt is increased in the given collateral.

containsSeries(uint256).details: Returns if a series has been added to the Controller, for a given series identified by maturity

debtDai(bytes32,uint256,address).details: Return debt in dai of an user, for a given collateral and series identified by maturity

erase(bytes32,address).details: Removes all collateral and debt for an user, for a given collateral type.

inDai(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: Returns the dai equivalent of an yDai amount, for a given series identified by maturity

inYDai(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: Returns the yDai equivalent of a dai amount, for a given series identified by maturity

isCollateralized(bytes32,address).details: Return if the borrowing power for a given collateral of an user is equal or greater than its debt for the same collateral

orchestrate(address).details: Add user to the authorized users list

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

post(bytes32,address,address,uint256).details: Takes collateral _token from `from` address, and credits it to `to` collateral account.

powerOf(bytes32,address).details: Maximum borrowing power of an user in dai for a given collateral

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

repayDai(bytes32,uint256,address,address.details: Takes dai from `from` address, user debt is decreased for the given collateral and yDai series.

repayYDai(bytes32,uint256,address,addres.details: Burns yDai of a given series from `from` address, user debt is decreased for the given collateral and yDai series.

revokeDelegate(address).details: Stop a delegate from acting on the behalf of caller

shutdown().details: Disables post, withdraw, borrow and repay. To be called only when Treasury shuts down.

totalDebtDai(bytes32,address).details: Returns the total debt of an user, for a given collateral, across all series, in Dai

totalSeries().details: Return the total number of series registered

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(bytes32,address,address,uint256.details: Returns collateral to `to` address, taking it from `from` collateral account.
